notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: The sequences of A (H1N1) pdm09 isolates reported in this work are available in GenBank ( www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/genbank) under accession numbers: ANH22064 - ARK18942; MH316121, MG815810; MH356637 - MH356647 and MK692755 - MK692776. Additional accession numbers in GISAID and GenBank databases of HA gene sequences of A/H1N1 pdm09 reference strains included in the analysis are in the S1 Table.
